Question: This person received 379, or over 70 percent of the Electoral College votes, with Dole receiving 159 electoral votes.
Hints: This person was inaugurated as the 42nd President of the United States on January 20, 1993.
This person made economic growth, job creation and educational improvement high priorities.
In 1998, Kathleen Willey alleged this person groped her in a hallway in 1993.
